Posts.Content: Spudzmum - your post was quite interesting.  I'm not sure why you would be upset at someone saying "but you look great".   Perhaps they are trying to reassure you - would you rather be told you look absolutely dreadful? Re the person who said "I had a lump but its nothing" - perhaps they went through hell when they discovered the lump, then the trauma of the tests and awaiting results day - to the immense relief when it was nothing.  Perhaps they were conveying to you that they have also been through the mill - albeit not to the same extent as you. I'm not being critical here - just an observation However, I do appreciate that there are some really insensitive people around
Posts.Title: Your cancer wasn't bad then....
